contents: To make a luminaria, open a brown paper lunch bag and fold the top inch. Fill the bottom of the bag with a small amount of sand to hold it down and to secure the candle. Place a votive candle firmly  in the center of the sand. Light the candle with a long fireplace lighter or match. (10) <u>The bag should stay open at the top and sit squarely on the ground before it’s filled.</u>
